name: Detour Noir
similarity: Uno dei Layton-clone più popolari. Bottiglia discutibile, ma succo eccellente.
similarityEn: One of the most popular Layton clones. Questionable bottle, but excellent juice.

name: 9PM
similarity: 'Beast mode' dolce bubblegum/vaniglia. Perfomance spesso superiori all'originale attuale.
similarityEn: 'Beast mode' sweet bubblegum/vanilla. Performance often superior to the current original.

name: La Yuqawam Pour Homme
similarity: Spesso ritenuto un riferimento tra i Tuscan Leather clone. Cuoio e lampone molto intensi.
similarityEn: Often considered a reference among Tuscan Leather clones. Very intense leather and raspberry.

name: Shiro
similarity: Impostazione fresca con componente “marine/aquatic‑woody” che ricorda molto l'EDP classico.
similarityEn: Fresh setting with 'marine/aquatic-woody' component that strongly recalls the classic EDP.

name: Blue Touch
similarity: Spesso recensito come “dupe” del profilo ADG; resa olfattiva vicina all'idea classica “fresh aquatic”.
similarityEn: Often reviewed as a 'dupe' of the ADG profile; olfactory rendering close to the classic 'fresh aquatic' idea.

name: 360° Red for Men
similarity: Spesso citato come “molto vicino” (in alcune review indicato come ~95%). Cheapie storico.
similarityEn: Often cited as 'very close' (in some reviews indicated as ~95%). Historic cheapie.

name: Just Me for Men
similarity: Descritto come sorprendentemente simile, con qualche compromesso sulla durata.
similarityEn: Described as surprisingly similar, with some compromise on longevity.
